metadata.title: Friday, 26th July, 2019
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to electrify the following institutions in Kafue District:
(i) Chikupi Secondary School; (ii) Lishiko Clinic; (iii) Chisakula Clinic; and (iv) Chitende Clinic; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.
